mdRecord.dcterms:title: Otey Cemetery, Alum Ridge Dist
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
This cemetery is located approximately 600 yards south of St Matthews Church, Dobbins Hollow Rd on Otey Rd. Ne adjscent to the driveway for 549 Otey Rd.NE. It is surrounded by a block wall with remnants of wrought iron gates. It sits on the edge of t he road making it easy to find. A limb from a walnut tree has fallen into the cemetery making access difficult. It can be seen from Google Earth and Google Maps.
37 00.947' 80 22.396'
